website_summaries.verdict: Sleek chrome and black make a bold statement with this contemporary model. Don't expect multi-functionality, but solid comfort and the old-school analog display are winners.
pros: Sophisticated, upscale appearance at a fraction of pricier watches
cons: Minimalist dial means no hours or minutes figures
Some complaints of the watch not being scratch-proof

website_summaries.verdict: Simple design, clean looks, and modern fashion-sense make this reasonably-priced watch a great match for your special events and occasions.
pros: Smooth, contemporary face and attractive styling make this watch suitable for nearly any dressy occasion
Solar powered means no need for batteries
Owners rave about its expensive looks and attractive price
cons: Face is prone to scratching, so it's not ideal to wear when doing some activities

customer_reviews.title: Battery came almost dead
customer_reviews.text: I received this beautiful watch on March 21. April 8th the battery died. April 10th I wrote a review. April 10th later in the day the watch started working again. Also April 10th I looked up how an eco-drive works. It’s been sitting in a dark room for 5 days. I’m an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Heneghen

customer_reviews.title: Could run small for big guys.
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice watch. Not too flashy which I prefer for school. Low profile watch with good design. Doesn't feel heavy but the material is sturdy. Good everyday use watch.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Just Wow! I wish I could give this 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have quite a few higher-end nice watches, and absolutely love Citizen Eco-Drive watches. My husband does as well. He is the manager of a higher end jewelry store and so he wears brands that help promote the store. At first I was like, meh ... he can get his manager's discount on any watch he can. But when I got the lightning deal on this, I just had to buy it for him for Christmas. I did and he absolutely loves it! They sell this exact watch only in the gold color. Let me tell you ... this watch is just as handsome on a wrist--even more so--than any of these pictures can portray!
customer_reviews.author: Nola Keith

customer_reviews.title: What i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing it for the last 2 weeks and i love it. Its a simple dial that works really well for formal-ish wear like shirts and suits! And always good to know i wont have to worry about battery on these eco drive watches!
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: I really liked thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this watch. Black and chrome steel combination gives it an elegant look. The dial is big and it makes absence of the hour marks even more pronounced that gives it a distinctive look. But it is not too big or bulky. It is a little thicker to accommodate the solar (photo) cell. Auto charging is a non-issue since its power consumption is negligible. On top of all that, a citizen at this price, I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Citizen Watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a watch guy, but I was getting tired to spend $$ for the battery replacements. I started purchasing Citizen with Eco-Drive and I am hooked. I love these Eco-Drive watches. This one, in particular, is very really cool looking and feels nice. I had a few co-workers admiring it the other day. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Amaral

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this watch for a month and was wearing in a couple of times a week but today the face cracked and I am totally sure it;s my fault but I am not sure where it happened but it happened. Amazon's end was great but when I tried to contact Citizen the only avenue to go through their service center at regular costs since they do not have a wear and tear warranty. it's a great watch but seems the front face is a little flimsey and will take at minimum of 2-3 week just to have a quote at what it will take to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hogsed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this during a Cyber Monday sale. Beautiful Watch. It gets mistaken for a Movado often. My last two watches were Movados and they cost much more and I have to say I like this one more than my last two. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alex10288

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful simple design
customer_reviews.text: This watch really works with light! That’s amazing! When I received it was completely stoped I put it on outside for a while and it stars working perfectly even at night. Beautiful simple design. It is shiny, elegant and you can feel it strong a well builded
customer_reviews.author: Victor Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Low design quality, Not rain proof
customer_reviews.text: Now I am not completely sure that this watch is an original merchandise. I a single shower the watch go water inside, still works but the screen is stained with the the dry drop mark. Never expected in a modern watch such low construction quality.
customer_reviews.author: Galo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look-
customer_reviews.text: I've had the watch for only a short time but love the look and have received compliments as well. It has a clean look that works well for work and dress as well.
customer_reviews.author: steve max

customer_reviews.title: Did not come in advertised cylindrical boxes
customer_reviews.text: The watches came without the original cylindrical boxes as shown on amazon website. I am not sure whether I got the original citizen watches or these are fake replicas.
customer_reviews.author: SABBIR

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sexy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for our anniversary and he loves it. The watch isn't too large so that it causes a blister like some other larger watches he has worn before. It's thin but super nice and the face is sleek clear glass.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this watch. I have had great luck with 20yr old fossil watch but it is seeing good wear so I have been wanting a Citizen Eco drive for a while. Finally found one in the price point I could handle. Only thing I wish it had was a second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mel N Klitzke

customer_reviews.title: Price, price, price.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible price!! My wife bought this watch as a present from Kohl’s with a $40.00 coupon and she paid $225.00 When I saw exactly the same watch for $80 bucks less I returned it and ordered from Amazon. Same watch, same case, same presentation, same warranty, brand new and much less money for my beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item.I thought maybe it would be gigantic and gaudy as seems to be fashionable(? )Now....but it's quite appropriately sized and of obvious quality while still being a little understated.I don't regret this purchase at all
customer_reviews.author: paul dalton

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing and fact it’s solar powered makes it even better as you don’t have to worry about batteries or anything. It’s sleek, modern, and looks professional. Just make sure you get the sizing right...
customer_reviews.author: Customer Name

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a short time, but it’s what I expected, sharp looking watch, nice band at a great price looking forward to wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Gapakl

customer_reviews.title: Very Dressy Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous watch. The eco drive feature guarantees no worries about battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis G. Meaux

customer_reviews.title: My first watch
customer_reviews.text: This was my first watch investment and I have been very happy so far. I had to get a few links taken out but it was no big deal at my local jeweler and now it fits great. Favorite part is that it's powered by light and it's sleek as can be. Im worried that the face will eventually get dinged up because its not protected but it hasn't so far! Guess that job is up to me. 9.5/10
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch as a Christmas gift for my son. It arrived on time and nicely packaged. It was so much nicer than the picture. Gorgeous watch, looks very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Looks very Fancy and battery free.
customer_reviews.text: My brother love this watch. I gift it to him for his 30th. He wears it to work, going on dates and church. It looks very fancy and the best part you don't have to buy batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Donna N

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new watch! The face is not too big, and the bracelet is beautiful. Nice contrast of silver bracelet to black watch face.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Citizen eco drive
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 with Amazon were house for $ 81each and they don't turn on been on sun for about 11 hours and nothing very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it during Black Friday when it was on sale. It looks very stylish and Citizen is a nice brand
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Whatcha out, do not buy unnecessary guarantee
customer_reviews.text: The watch is as advertised. In the description, there is no mention of a fou year guarantee by Citizen. Amazon the sells a unnecessary four year warranty forb$8.00. Very bad
customer_reviews.author: Henry A. Unger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad’s Christmas present. It is a beautiful watch and I know he’s going to be thrilled with it. Also got it for a great price. Gave it to him early and he is thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: pookiemon

customer_reviews.title: Truly a beautiful watch so elegant for under $300
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband and he LOVES it... He has received so many compliments on it.. Many people guessing it to be much more expensive than it was. Truly a beautiful watch so elegant for under $300
customer_reviews.author: MM 11

customer_reviews.title: Classic watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch a lot. I have been wearing it since I got it. I have about 7 watches, and this becoming my favorite. The screen get dirty easily. That’s the what I don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim Maga

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a eco-drive watch priced like this one. Perfect for an every day watch. I like it better than my more expensive watches.
customer_reviews.author: S J P

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant and best part is eco-drive
customer_reviews.text: I love Citizen eco-drive watches. This one is simple elegant looking, one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Dhrumin

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product, nothing to complain about, and for a good price! I would defenitly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Diego Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous watch. Great deal on Black Friday. Even at full price it’s a great value. Similar to a Rado I paid 5x more for.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Looks decent but it scratches
customer_reviews.text: It’s elegant and classy. Time keeping is also great. I was hoping it to glow at night but it doesn’t. I also thought the glass would be non-scratchable but I’m already seeing some scratches on it when viewing from an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Yograj

customer_reviews.title: Very Sheik
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it looks great!! Time will tell, if it keeps ticking with Light movement. Package well and has all the Citizen boxes. Overall satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sandman23

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my boyfriend after reading the positive reviews and reasonable price. I received this watch in poor condition. There appeared to be moisture trapped inside the face of the watch. Returned 👎
customer_reviews.author: Heather reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift. He loves it! Great looking watch. Can't go wrong with Citizen Eco-Drive.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: Citizen quality! No batteries to replace! And it looks great! What more could you want in a watch?
customer_reviews.author: Peter Swan

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! I love it! It’s elegant and sophisticated like the Movado, but for a fraction of the price. I’d recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: HouTXGuy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bout one for my husband last Christmas...we were engaged. He lost it on our honeymoon this spring, so I bought him another one for this Christmas. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Claborn

customer_reviews.title: almost like a Movado
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous, very stylish, almost like a Movado. I like that the watch is thin and doesn't weigh on the wrist so much. It seems sturdy yet elegant. Looking forward to seeing how well it holds up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: SteelerfaninPeru

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! My wife bought this for me as a Christmas gift. I wear suits everyday and wanted an elegant watch that would stand out and this is it! It is beautiful!! Great craftsmanship and very classy!
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Stylish not practical.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good looking, however it is of the style that I would consider an "evening watch" and not an every day type of watch. Due to the lack of number indicators, it is hard to accurately tell the time.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN DES AULNIERS

customer_reviews.title: Great watch if you get it on sale. it feels a little cheap and it's lightweight,
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch great functionality good brand does feel a little light and cheap though
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Great catch
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek. Got it on a special price, super great
customer_reviews.author: Safder

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful ,very thin and best quality
customer_reviews.text: My wife gave me this on our anniversary . Too good . I will recomend
customer_reviews.author: Nigi

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way this watch looks and feels
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about one week. When I visited a local jewelry store to have the band adjusted, I noticed comparable Citizen watches selling for $100 more than I paid. I really like the way this watch looks and feels.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant watch. Minimalist dial and understated elegance. Eco drive means you'll never have to buy batteries. Great value. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: George Holczer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves the watch, needed to remove 3 links, but other than that, very sophisticated looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Timeless
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so classy. He loves it. Gave it to him a year ago & it's still spanking new.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband as an anniversary gift. It is very nice but it was to big for him. Going to have to take a link or two out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch, I just wish I had noticed before hand that it didn't have a second hand.
customer_reviews.author: Art Florez

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch that looks great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch! It’s my first Citizen eco drive and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch just as described. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, the watch isn't too thick and it's not too large diameter. I like it so much I just ordered a women's just like it for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Very nice and stylish look. I’ve been wearing them for couple days and so far, I’m quite happy
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: I love the simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity. Not too big not not too small. Pretty light weight as well. But only downside is the water proof feature is only splash resistance. Also, if you want specific minutes, you might not be able to read due to lack of numberings.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lee

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and he is really very pleased, with the watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he is really very pleased, with the watch, it looks great. It was delivered on time and in an original box. true he has only had it for a couple of months but he is very happy
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and minimalist design of this Eco drive watch. The price is super attractive as well at only $108.
customer_reviews.author: Jahangir Rouhani

customer_reviews.title: You have to charge the dang thing right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Initial view- the watch needed to be charged by a light source and the best source is the sun, which brought the charge time down quite a bit (11hrs from dead). So far- I already scratched the face dang it, but it still looks good and tells the time.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the echo drive technology and love the price....the look ain’t too bad either 😜
customer_reviews.author: akiva s.

customer_reviews.title: Wow ! What a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The watch was everything I expected. Arrived earlier than stated in excellent condition. Completely powered by any type of light. Primarily use as a dress watch.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price (got it on sale for 80$)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mahanna

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer
customer_reviews.text: First Citizen watch i have owned. So far every time I have wore it I always get compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Medina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch for the price. Perfect as a work watch for my husband
customer_reviews.author: Lori Welch

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty watch, it was a gift and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eco-drive
customer_reviews.text: So far one of the best looking and durable machines I’m wore and seen . Very elegant- highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: best gift I ever got my husband for his anniversary ...
customer_reviews.text: best gift I ever got my husband for his anniversary he loves it its classy looks good on him

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Other than getting used to telling time without the numbers, this is a quality watch. No need to change batteries as it relies on solar power. Highly recommend this and any eco citizen watches.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch to wear for business casual and casual suits. Keep in mind it needs any light to have the battery running and good
customer_reviews.author: Luis Castillo

customer_reviews.title: It's a citizen
customer_reviews.text: Looks stunning in person. Citizen will continue to be my favorite watch. The movement and looks you just can't beat for the price

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to the collection
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid on black Friday deal, I'm pleased
customer_reviews.author: jman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Got mine in June for $130. Price fluctuates every so often so keep your eye on it, if you're patient. Very pleased with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our son for his college graduation. He loves it! Sleek, simple but sophisticated.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS LIKE A VERY EXPENSIVE WATCH! MY DAD LOVED IT!!!

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very classy watch ...for the price it looks a lot more attractive than the more expensive brands .
customer_reviews.author: romie scott

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST WATCHES TO BUY POINT BLANK
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicest watches I have ever bought, and I've bought tons. Looks great, has a great weight to it, for the price, AMAZING WATCH!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about it. Nice watch for the price i pay. Will definitely buy it as a gift for someone.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!! Would love to buy another from the series
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and classy product from citizen.. got a good deal too

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow This watch is a beautiful and classy watch. I have a party and everyone ask me where I bought this watch it's beautiful I got a lot of compliments

customer_reviews.text: Duplicate used watch received, with scratches on the belt..and faded dial..

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Price is very fair for a watch like this .

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my husband. He absolutely loved the watch, and it fit his large wrist perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal on great product. Best deal in history. Product better than expected

customer_reviews.title: I like how it's simple
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's simple, clean, and classy, but I'm not a fan of the bracelet, it looks less polish compared to the watch case. All in all, it's a great value for the price, and I like how it sits on my wrist.

product_meta.title: Citizen Watches AU1060-51E Eco-Drive Axiom
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Citizen Eco-Drive™ FAQ
 * Sleek and sophisticated are the first two things that come to mind when wearing this stunning Citizen® timepiece. 
 * Using the most advanced technology in watchmaking, the Eco-Drive never needs a battery. Citizen's Eco-Drive technology harnesses the power of light (natural or artificial) and converts it into energy which is stored in a permanently rechargeable lithium-ion cell. Recharges continuously and has a power reserve that lasts from 6 months to 5 years (depends on model).
 * Silver-tone stainless steel case.
 * Silver-tone stainless steel bracelet features a fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Round case, 40mm.
 * Featuring a black dial with silver-tone hands, stick marker at twelve o'clock, logo and date window.
 * Two-hand Eco-Drive™ quartz movement with date display window.
 * Water resistant 30 meters/100 feet.
 * Citizen Watch offers a five-year limited manufacturer's warranty on all their products. For more information, please visit their website and see the "Service Information" section.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Item model number :AU1060-51E
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium ion batteries required.
 * Date First Available :March 10, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Citizen
 * ASIN :B00KCF7F10

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #233,906 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1665 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #65290 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars585 ratings 

 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Citizen Eco-Drive™ FAQ
 * Sleek and sophisticated are the first two things that come to mind when wearing this stunning Citizen® timepiece. 
 * Using the most advanced technology in watchmaking, the Eco-Drive never needs a battery. Citizen's Eco-Drive technology harnesses the power of light (natural or artificial) and converts it into energy which is stored in a permanently rechargeable lithium-ion cell. Recharges continuously and has a power reserve that lasts from 6 months to 5 years (depends on model).
 * Silver-tone stainless steel case.
 * Silver-tone stainless steel bracelet features a fold-over clasp closure with push-button release.
 * Round case, 40mm.
 * Featuring a black dial with silver-tone hands, stick marker at twelve o'clock, logo and date window.
 * Two-hand Eco-Drive™ quartz movement with date display window.
 * Water resistant 30 meters/100 feet.
 * Citizen Watch offers a five-year limited manufacturer's warranty on all their products. For more information, please visit their website and see the "Service Information" section.
feature_bullets: Silver-tone watch with black topring and dial featuring logo, date window, and single 12 o'clock hour marker
40 mm case with mineral dial window. H504, 1-Second Chronograph, 1 Second Chronograph Measures up to 60 Minutes
Japanese quartz movement with analog display and equipped with Eco-Drive, which charges in natural or indoor light
Stainless steel band with fold-over clasp with single push-button safety closure
Water resistant to 30 m (99 ft): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
